freecell.controller

Interface IFreecellController<K>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FreecellController

    public interface IFreecellController<K>
    Interface for the freecell game controller. An implementation will work with the IFreeCellModel interface to provide a game of freecell

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void playGame(java.util.List<K> deck, FreecellOperations<K> model, boolean shuffle)
      Start and play a new game of freecell with the provided deck.

    • Method Detail

      • playGame

        void playGame(java.util.List<K> deck,
              FreecellOperations<K> model,
              boolean shuffle)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
              java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Start and play a new game of freecell with the provided deck. This deck should be used as-is. This method returns only when the game is over (either by winning or by quitting)
        Parameters:
        deck - the deck to be used to play this game
        model - the model for the game
        shuffle - shuffle the deck if true, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the deck is null or invalid, or if the model is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the controller is unable to read input or transmit output
